title: UK finance regulators should pay heed to energy security policy, says Sunak - Reuters
content: UK finance regulators should pay heed to energy security policy, says Sunak  Reuters
description: Britain's finance minister Rishi Sunak on Thursday called on the country's financial regulators to pay heed to the country's new energy strategy when it comes to regulating banks and investment firms, a step campaigners said contradicts the push to a net-zero economy.
